Hi, Let's start !!

I'm a Computer Science & Engineering graduate. I have always been interested in the development of softwares because of the curiosity of how and why these programs works the way they do.
I love the way how combination of creativity and logical problem solving skills when crafted in code solves the real life problems and makes it even easier.

I started my programmming journey with C and am still fond of and write code in it occasionly.

By day I mostly write code in C#, Javascript and very often use libraries like jQuery, Bootstrap.
By Night I try to learn and master few things which I like apart from my daily work.

I like playing cricket, sometimes chess and love listening to music.
